title: Decentralized Approach to Detect and Eliminate Flapping Phenomena due to Flexible Resources
summary: This paper presents a decentralized methodology for detecting and mitigating flapping phenomena in power systems, primarily caused by the operation of discrete devices. The proposed approach applies moving-window autocorrelation to local measurements, enabling each device to autonomously identify sustained oscillations.
